entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
